title: AD Connect
description: This workshop centers around helping the user better understand the basics of Azure Active Directory, including Office 365. Particiapnts with learn how to connect and synchronize an on-premises Active Directory with Azure AD.

title: Docker on Ubuntu (Linux-based containers)
description: As an introduction into Linux-based containers, this workshop, will help you gain experience in installing and configuring Docker on an Ubuntu server and deploying different images as containers.

title: Docker on CentOS (Linux-based containers)
description: As an introduction into Linux-based containers, this workshop, will help you gain experience in installing and configuring Docker on a CentOS server and deploying different images as containers.

title: Docker on Windows Server 2016 (Windows-based containers)
description: As an introduction into Linux-based containers, this workshop, will help you gain experience in installing and configuring Docker on a Windows Server 2016 server and deploying different images as containers.

title: Docker Automation with Dockerfiles (Linux)
description: This workshop will show you how to automate the building and configuring of a Linux-based Docker image by utilizing Dockerfiles. You will construct a Dockerfile by mimicking a production environment while learning some of the options for a Dockerfile configuration.

title: Docker Automation with Dockerfiles (Windows Server)
description: Docker Automation with Dockerfiles (Windows Server) description

title: Monitoring Docker with Operations Management Suite (OMS)
description: Monitoring Docker with Operations Management Suite (OMS) description

title: Azure Key Vault (presentation only)
description: Azure Key Vault helps safeguard cryptographic keys and secrets (such as authentication keys, storage account keys, data encryption keys, .PFX files, and passwords) used by cloud applications and service that are protected by hardware security modules (HSMs).
